question: Which statement about night reading preference is most accurate?

options.A: More than half of people in county Z prefer reading at night.
options.B: Fewer than half of people in county Z prefer reading at night.
options.C: Night and morning preferences are about the same.
options.D: Around oneâ€‘third of people in county Z prefer reading at night.

explanation: The grey slice (Night) is 45%, which is less than half. The misleading angle encourages choosing that more than half prefer night, but the majority is actually the red Morning slice (55%).
